mapper.select: SELECT T1.BOARD_IDX, T1.USER_IDX, T2.USER_ID, T1.SUBJECT, T1.CONTENT, T1.HIT_CNT, LEFT(T1.REG_DATE,10) AS REG_DATE FROM QNA_BOARD T1 JOIN USERS T2 ON T1.USER_IDX = T2.USER_IDX WHERE T1.BOARD_IDX = ${value};
SELECT BOARD_IDX FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_IDX > ${value} ORDER BY BOARD_IDX ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT BOARD_IDX FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_IDX < ${value} ORDER BY BOARD_IDX DESC LIMIT 1
